name: MouseScroll
description: This event is fired when the mouse wheel is scrolled.
overview: Fires when the mouse wheel is scrolled. The `amount` field indicates scroll direction and magnitude. Positive values scroll down, negative values scroll up. This event is cancellable - preventing the scroll action. Useful for custom hotkey systems or UI interactions.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
